title: A Brief history of astronomy
creator_credit: Manitoba Museum of Man and Nature and McGraw-Hill Films
brief_description: An animated film tracing humankind’s appreciation of the universe, from the earliest interest in the sun and sky, throughout history to our present knowledge of modern astronomy. Reviews the ideas of great thinkers and philosophers like Ptolemy, Copernicus, Tycho Brahe, Kepler, Galileo and Newtown.
